name: Rainshowersounds
0:
”Alexa open rain shower sounds”
”Alexa ask rain shower sounds to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rain shower sounds
des: Rain Shower Sounds is the perfect way to fall sleep to the sound of a gentle shower of rain. Simply activate it by saying, 'Alexa, play Relaxing Rain Shower Sounds,' and enjoy a 30-minute session of sound. It's an excellent feature to use during sleep, for deep relaxation, meditation practices, or to help concentrate on your tasks.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
